reviews.review_msg: Elizabeth is very kind and considerate. She is knowledgeable and gives great feedback. She helped me improve my drawing so much. On a side note, Elizabeth is also a really handsome gal :)

Inspiring, wonderful person! Extremely knowledgable in her advice to students. Also, she's a practicing artist herself. Creates a comfortable and safe learning environment open to creative exploration. Lets you redo assignments. Marks assignments fairly based on criteria sheet with techniques covered in class.
